transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji, namaste boliye.
Executive: Namaskar sir, Anshika baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan ji, abhi aapka call aaya tha aur phir Poonam ji se aapki baat hui thi jo aapke account manager hai service ke regarding.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: To aapne unhone hame update kiya hai ki aapne kuch products vagaira unko mention kiye ki in products ki leads aapko matlab abhi chahiye jiski requirement abhi market mein hai, right sir?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan haan. To wo maine inko inform kar diya hai ki aap sir ko regular basis pe leads vagaira share kare. Aur main kuch aur bhi sir correction dekh pa rahi thi ki jo aapne products mention kiye usme hum kuch aur jaise hamare paas kuch aur bhi alternative keywords hai usse related jaise solar water pump ki aapne baat ki. To ek solar water pump ke andar ek matlab ye keyword hai sir aapka solar water pump. Iske andar aapne 16 alag alag products add kar rakhe hue hai. Vaise hi same aapka ek aur keyword hai solar water pumping system. Jiske andar sirf ek hi product add hai solar water pumping system. Kya hum isme matlab minimum do ya do se zyada products add honge to aur achcha hamare paas result aayega. To isme kuch aur products add kar sakte hai?
Customer: Aap kar dijiye, mai kar deta hu jo photos aur product dale hai.
Executive: Haan keywords bhi hum apni taraf se add kar denge. Aur bahut sare suggestions aate hai naam ke product ke ki aap ye bhi add kar sakte ho, ye bhi add kar sakte ho jo usse related hota hai jo buyer search karta hai. To mai wo apni taraf se kuch add kara dungi kuch keywords to baki aap details jaise rahega ki photo ho gaya, price vagaira ho gaya to wo aap apni taraf se add kar lijiyega. To aise karke jo jo aapne main main products ke naam bataye hame unme aapke matlab keywords mein kam se kam har ek keyword mein minimum do product add ho jayenge.
Customer: Thik hai, thik hai mam mai karwa dunga usko aap nahi kar payenge to mai abhi sham me karwa dunga.
Executive: Baki sir isme jaise ki aapke na bahut sare products hai jisme ki pictures nahi added hai. Jaise mai dekh pa rahi hu 35 products aise hai jisme isme photos nahi added hai. Aur specification nahi hai.
Customer: Wo to mai koi dhyan hi nahi de pa raha hai na pehli baat to abhi kyuki jab fursat me ho tab usko uchit karenge.
Executive: Sir isko matlab hum add nahi kar sakte kyuki sir dekhiye jaise aapne bola hai ki aapko requirement zyada chahiye ki zyada se zyada requirement generate ho ya phir zyada se zyada leads.
Customer: Nahi nahi mujhe client conversion mujhe client conversion chahiye do char panch lakh ki billing aapki taraf se to mai aapka renewal le lunga. Renewal ke liye phone aaya tha to maine kaha ki aapki taraf se business nahi mil raha hai inquiries mil rahi hai keval bas to convert nahi ho raha hai client.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji sir samajh gayi mai but haan uske against client convert ho.
Customer: Sir jab aapka renewal lunga. Mera kehne ka matlab hai sir thoda sa haan aap prayas karke dekh lijiye ki abhi season chal raha hai solar water pump ka ek do mahine matlab khub bik raha hai.
Executive: Bilkul sir. To sir hame jaise agar hame ek quality of leads quality of buyer hame chahiye to uske liye hame apne catalog pe zyada se zyada details add karni hongi taki jab buyer hamara profile dekhe to usko sari cheeze clearly visible ho kyuki sir dekhiye buyer ko jab tak hum.
Customer: Mai karunga mai usko thik karane ka jisme photos nahi hai wo sab baki.
Executive: Haan baki sir aap agar hame aap detail bhej denge to hum bhi yaha se add kar denge photos vagaira.
Customer: Maine bheja hai Poonam madam ko bheji hai details.
Executive: Achcha okay. Videos bhi dalu kya usme?
Executive: Videos aapke pass hai sir videos?
Customer: Haan hamare installation work ke jo humne jaha jaha lagwa lagwa product ke to added hai aapke ji sir.
Executive: Haan. Aur sir aap ek bar na thoda sa rating review aap apni taraf se dekh lijiyega kyuki na rating review hamari jo hai na 3.9 hai matlab 70 70 logo ne humko rating diya jo ki bahut achcha number hai but bahut sare logo ne hame one star two star diya hua hai. To ye ye kyuki aapki taraf se hi hoga aap jab buyer se baat kariye.
Customer: Buyer se kya baat kare buyer aisi cheez chahta hai ki jo hawa mein hai matlab hai hi nahi duniya mein. To usko kya bolegi bhai manahi kare na ki bhai is rate mein to sambhav hi nahi hai. To wo buyer negative rating dalta hai.
Executive: Aap ek bar dekh lijiyega apni taraf se jaise ki agar koi hame one star de raha hai to ek bar reconnect karke dekh lijiyega might bhi waha se hame response thik mil jaye wo kyuki buyer ke pass option hota hai usko edit karne ka ya usko correct karne ka. To kyuki ye sare parameters sir hame help karenge jitna achcha profile hamara banega to utna hi achcha ek buyer hum connect kar payenge utna hi quality of buyer to conversion mein bhi phir hame wahi se milega.
Customer: To haan mere ko aap sort isko sort out karke de sakte hai kisne kisne kam rating diya hai?
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Sort list karke de sakte hai aisa mere ko dekhna padega mai karwata hu usko bhi.
Executive: Rating wala sir?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan rating wala mai yaha se dikhta hai hame bhi rating review to jinhone one star ya two star de rakha hoga mai unka screenshot leke aapko whatsapp kara deti hu.
Customer: Thik.
Executive: Thik hai sir aur aapke pass aapke account manager ka number hai sir? Unko number check kar lijiyega sir aapko kuch bhi issue lage aap unke number pe ek bar connect kar liya kare ya whatsapp pe ek bar message drop kar denge to wo dobara se aapko connect kar lengi.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir aur mai call ka feedback aayega aapke pass mein sir please feedback de dijiyega.
Customer: Thik hai ji.
Executive: Okay sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Needs client conversion, not just inquiries.

- Many products lack pictures and specifications.

- Negative ratings affecting the profile.



Resolution:

- Executive will share regular leads.

- Will add relevant keywords to products.

- Will share screenshots of low ratings on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to add photos and details to products.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, client conversion, product details, ratings, catalog
